content:
Hi all,

We're hosting a hybrid short course "Data Visualization in Python: Leveraging Community Tools for Earth System Science Across Scales" at the upcoming AMS Annual Meeting on January 12, 2025 from 8:00 AM - 12:00 PM CST at the New Orleans Ernest N. Morial Convention Center and online. More info and registration details here. We'd love to see you there and feel free to share with anyone you think might be interested!
